Title: The Invisible Hand (No. 63)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Jonathan Shapiro, Lukas Reiter, Marisa Tam (story editor), Taylor Martin (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Amir Arison
Plot: Red points the Task Force toward a group that targets people with reprehensible but legal actions. As Red helps one of his employees, Liz discovers a clue about Tom's investigation.
